hints.content:
[[☃ image 1]]






I eat $6$ jelly beans each day for $9$ days.

We can multiply to find the number of jelly beans eaten. 

$9\times6=\blueD{54}$

options.alt: A rectangle divided into two unequal parts. The first part is  bigger than the second part. The first part is labeled 54 and Eaten and has a curved bracket across the bottom labeled 9 times 6. The second part is labeled In bowl and has a curved bracket across the bottom labeled with a question mark. A curved bracket below the entire rectangle is labeled 75. !

hints.content:
$\greenD{\text{Total}}$ jelly beans $-$ jelly beans $\blueD{\text{eaten}}$ $=$ number  left in the $\maroonD{\text{bowl}}$ 



$\greenD{75}-\blueD{54}=\maroonD{21}$
$\maroonD{21}$ jelly beans are in the bowl after $9$ days.

question.content:
I put $75$ jelly beans in a bowl. Each day I eat $6$ jelly beans.
 
**How many jelly beans  are in the bowl after $9$ days?** 
 
[[☃ input-number 1]] jelly beans
